      • getTopVisibleCoordinate

        public static int getTopVisibleCoordinate(android.view.View view)
        Retrieve the coordinate of the top of the "available area where content can be placed and remain visible to users" within the FrameLayout view. In most cases, this will be equivalent to the height of the status bar.
        Parameters:
        view -
        Returns:

      • getDisplayHeight

        public static int getDisplayHeight(android.app.Activity activity)
        Retrieve the size of the display in dp. The display height includes all screen decorations, such as the status bar.
        Parameters:
        activity -
        Returns:
